sourcesContent:
const product = {
    id: 1,
    name: "Raven Hoodie With Black colored Design",
    price: 63.00,
    rating: 3.5,
    reviews: 120,
    sizes: ["XS", "S", "M", "L", "XL"],
    colors: ["#000000", "#D4A373", "#F5F5DC", "#8B0000"], // Black, Beige, Red, etc.
    images: [
      "assets/images/raven-hoodie-1.jpg",
      "assets/images/raven-hoodie-2.jpg",
      "assets/images/raven-hoodie-3.jpg",
      "assets/images/raven-hoodie-4.jpg"
    ],
    description: 
      "100% Bio-washed Cotton – makes the fabric extra soft & silky. Flexible ribbed crew neck. Precisely stitched with no pilling & no fading. Provide all-time comfort. Anytime, anywhere. Infinite range of matte-finish HD prints.",
    features: [
      { icon: "secure_payment", text: "Secure payment" },
      { icon: "size_fit", text: "Size & Fit" },
      { icon: "free_shipping", text: "Free shipping" },
      { icon: "returns", text: "Free Shipping & Returns" }
    ],
    specifications: {
      fabric: "Bio-washed Cotton",
      pattern: "Printed",
      fit: "Regular-fit",
      neck: "Round Neck",
      sleeve: "Half-sleeves",
      style: "Casual Wear"
    }
  };
  
  export default product;
